title: Favero Assioma Pedals: A deep dive into Dysfunction
content: So, I recently had the pleasure of dissecting the engineering marvel that is the Favero Assioma power meter pedal. And by “pleasure,” I mean I aged about five years in disbelief. Despite the proudly flaunted “Made in Italy” label, these pedals are basically a how-to guide for what not to do when designing cycling equipment....
